sen.j: 小川通（おがわどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Ogawa-dori Street is a north-south running street of Kyoto City.
The Ogawa-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.
The Ogawa-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は紫明通から南は錦小路通まで。
sen.e: It extends from the Shimei-dori Street in the north to the Nishikikoji-dori Street in the south.
It extends from Shimei-dori Street in the north to Nishikikoji-dori Street in the south.
It extends from Shimei-dori Street in the north to Nishikikoji-dori Street in the south.

sen.j: 南の延長線上を東中筋通（ひがしなかすじどおり、別名天使突抜通、てんしのつきぬけどおり）が走る。
sen.e: The Higashinakasuji-dori Street, also known as the Tenshinotsukinuke-dori Street, runs along its southern extension.
The Higashinakasuji-dori Street, also known as Tenshinotsukinuke-dori Street, runs along its southern extension.
The Higashinakasuji-dori Street, also known as Tenshinotsukinuke-dori Street, runs along its southern extension.

sen.j: 平安京には存在せず、豊臣秀吉による天正の地割で新設された通りである。
sen.e: It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning.
It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning policy.
It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning policy.

sen.j: 一条通以北に昭和後期まで流れていた小川（こかわ）にちなむ。
sen.e: The name of the street comes from Kokawa, a stream that ran north of the Ichijo-dori Street until the late Showa era.
The name of the street comes from Kokawa, a stream that ran north of Ichijo-dori Street until the late Showa era.
The name of the street comes from Kokawa, a stream that ran north of Ichijo-dori Street until the late Showa period.

sen.j: 現状
sen.e: Current Status
Current Status
Current Status

sen.j: 上立売通以北では西にずれ、油小路通の延長に近いところを走る。
sen.e: The section north of the Kamitachiuri-dori Street deviates westward to run near the extension of the Aburanokoji-dori Street.
The section north of Kamitachiuri-dori Street deviates westward to run near the extension of Aburanokoji-dori Street.
The section north of Kamitachiuri-dori Street deviates westward to run near the extension of Aburanokoji-dori Street.

sen.j: 北端に近い寺之内通上ルには表千家の不審菴、裏千家の今日庵が並んでいる。
sen.e: Fushinan of Omotesenke and Konnichian of Urasenke are located side by side at Teranouchi-dori agaru near its northern end.
Fushinan of Omotesenke and Konnichian of Urasenke are located side by side at Teranouchi-dori agaru near its northern end.
Fushinan tea room of Omotesenke school and Konnichian tea room of Urasenke school are located side by side at Teranouchi-dori agaru near its northern end.
sen.cmt: "Fushinan tea room of Omotesenke school", "Konnichian tea room of Urasenke school"としました。

sen.j: 下長者町通から下立売通の間では京都府庁に近いことから公共機関がいくつかある。
sen.e: There are several public offices along the section between the Shimochojamachi-dori Street and the Shimotateuri-dori Street, because the area is near the Kyoto Prefectural Government.
There are several public offices along the section between Shimochojamachi-dori Street and Shimotateuri-dori Street, because the area is near the Kyoto Prefectural Government.
There are several public offices along the section between Shimochojamachi-dori Street and Shimotateuri-dori Street, because the area is near the Kyoto Prefectural Government.

sen.j: また南端では寺町通に移転した本能寺の跡を貫いている。
sen.e: The southern end of the street passes through the site of Honno-ji Temple, which was relocated to an area long the Teramachi-dori Street.
The southern end of the street passes through the site of Honno-ji Temple, which was relocated to an area along Teramachi-dori Street.
The southern end of the street passes through the site of Honno-ji Temple, which was relocated to an area along Teramachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 東中筋通
sen.e: Higashinakasuji-dori Street
Higashinakasuji-dori Street
Higashinakasuji-dori Street

sen.j: 東中筋通（ひがしなかすじどおり）は小川通を南へ延長した線上にあり、北は仏光寺通から南は木津屋橋通まで。
sen.e: The Higashinakasuji-dori Street is located along the southern extension of the Ogawa-dori Street, running from the Bukkoji-dori Street in the north to the Kizuyabashi-dori Street in the south.
The Higashinakasuji-dori Street is located along the southern extension of Ogawa-dori Street, running from Bukkoji-dori Street in the north to Kizuyabashi-dori Street in the south.
The Higashinakasuji-dori Street is located along the southern extension of Ogawa-dori Street, running from Bukkoji-dori Street in the north to Kizuyabashi-dori Street in the south.

sen.j: 天使突抜通（てんしつきぬけどおり）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also named as Tenshitsukinuke-dori.
It is also called Tenshitsukinuke-dori.
It is also called Tenshitsukinuke-dori Street.

sen.j: 「天使」とは五条通との交差点近くにある五条天神社を指し、神社の境内を貫通して道が開かれたことが通り名の由来となった。
sen.e: "Tenshi" refers to Gojo Tenjinja Shrine located near the crossing with the Gojo-dori Street and the name of the street comes from the fact that the street opened by passing through its precinct.

"Tenshi" refers to Gojo Tenjinja Shrine located near the intersection with Gojo-dori Street and the name of the street comes from the fact that the street was opened and passed through the Shrine grounds.

Tenshi' refers to Gojoten-jinja Shrine located near the intersection with Gojo-dori Street and the name of the street comes from the fact that the street was opened and passed through the Shrine grounds.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更、 Gojoten-jinja Shrineとしました。
